item.title:
ODIA FILMMAKER'S SILENT SHORT FILM 'LIFE DROP' WINS AGAIN
An Odia filmmaker from Bhubaneswar,...
item.description:
ODIA FILMMAKER'S SILENT SHORT FILM 'LIFE DROP' WINS AGAIN An Odia filmmaker from Bhubaneswar, Abhishek Swain's inspirational documentaries are creating a buzz globally. ‘Life Drop’ is his third short film, and has been declared winner at the Global India International Film Festival in the advertisement category. It was screened at the National Film Archives of India in Pune. The 30-second long film was shot in Bonda Hills in Koraput. He has compared the falling sound of water drops with the life of a baby. It has already won the Best film award in ‘Human Rights Short Film Festival’ in Bangladesh while competing among 738 films from 82 countries. It was in the finals at the 16th Frames Film Festival in Navi Mumbai and also got selected at Velcom Smart film in Russia.
